cross: Epidendrum Sun Valley x Epidendrum Pacific Vista

measurements.description: One hundred twenty-seven umbellate evenly spaced full flowers and 120 buds on five up to 25.3-cm upright inflorescences; sepals and petals orange suffused red; lip tri-lobed, lanciniate, yellow-orange overlaid yellow basally, slighly stippled red; column red, yellow distally; substance medium; texture crystalline, lip matte.
